title: Mars Science Lab launch delayed two years
description: NASA's launch of the Mars Science Laboratory -- hampered by technical difficulties and cost overruns -- has been delayed until the fall of 2011, NASA officials said at a news conference Thursday in Washington.

title: Shuttle lands at California air base
description: NASA officials Sunday waved off the first opportunity for space shuttle Endeavour to return to Earth, citing poor weather conditions.

title: Inspiration for 'Contact' still listening
description: From a remote valley in Northern California, Jill Tarter is listening to the universe.

title: Indian lunar orbiter hit by heat rise
description: Scientists have switched off several on-board instruments to halt rising temperatures inside India's first unmanned lunar spacecraft.
